scripts.test: npm run build && echo "Do some validations..."
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-git-config && npm run deploy-gh-pages
scripts.deploy-git-config: echo "$GIT_EMAIL $GIT_NAME" && git config --global user.email "$GIT_EMAIL" && git config --global user.name "$GIT_NAME"
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: git clone --quiet https://$GH_USERNAME:$GH_TOKEN@github.com/${CONFIG_OWNER}/${CONFIG_REPO} ../build &&  cp -R _site/* ../build && cd ../build && git add -A . && git commit -a -m "Travis build $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER." && git push --quiet origin master > /dev/null
